system.description: You are able to make Koffing-class Curries as a Camp Action. One of these Curries restores 25% of the party's max HP. After making a Koffing-class Curry, roll a d100. On a 1, you attract a non-hostile Pokemon from the local environment to investigate the camp.

actions.name: Koffing-Class Curry
actions.description: You are able to make Koffing-class Curries as a Camp Action. One of these Curries restores 25% of the party's max HP. After making a Koffing-class Curry, roll a d100. On a 1, you attract a non-hostile Pokemon from the local environment to investigate the camp.
